publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2714# Mr Lloyd Quinan: British Trade Ban on Israel-That the Parliament notes the continued incursions by the Israeli defence forces into areas controlled by the Palestinian Authority and believes that Her Majesty's Government should cease all trade with Israel until the Israeli Government complies with United Nations Resolution 242.

S1M-2714# Mr Lloyd Quinan: British Trade Ban on Israel—That the Parliament notes the continued incursions by the Israeli defence forces into areas controlled by the Palestinian Authority and believes that Her Majesty’s Government should cease all trade with Israel until the Israeli Government complies with United Nations Resolution 242. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2714# British Trade Ban on Israel (lodged on 6 February 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2714# British Trade Ban on Israel (lodged on 6 February 2002) Alex Neil*
S1M-2714# British Trade Ban on Israel (lodged on 6 February 2002) Mr John McAllion*
